title: Do the Samsung Galaxy S22 and Galaxy S22 Plus support the S Pen?
content:
For years, the S Pen was the key feature of Samsung’s Galaxy Note series of smartphones, and it was the whole reason behind the Note name. But in 2021, Samsung discontinued the Galaxy Note series, and instead, we got S Pen support in the Galaxy S21 Ultra, but it was half-baked. With the Galaxy S22

The post Do the Samsung Galaxy S22 and Galaxy S22 Plus support the S Pen? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The S Pen is now built into the Galaxy S22 Ultra, bringing full-fledged support to the Galaxy S series. But what about the smaller models?
